name: Dig Dork
description:
Dig Dork!

A digdug clone made in Pico-8. made for Github Game Off Jam 11/2017

https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2017

Press z to fire hook. 

Kill enemies with rocks for extra points!

check out my twitter:

https://twitter.com/mccolgst

Note: this game is still pretty buggy but I have to release before end of the jam!!!
